      • execute

        public void execute()
        Executes a Build Settlement request
        Specified by:
        execute in interface Command
        Pre Conditions:;
        the settlement location is open, the settlement location is not on water, the settlement location is connected to one of your roads except during setup, you have the required resources (1 wood, 1 brick, 1 wheat, 1 sheep, 1 settlement), the settlement cannot be placed adjacent to another settlement
        Post Conditions:
        you lost the resources required to build the settlement, the settlement is on the map at the specified location
